step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Ensure your elbows stay close to your head as you raise them.
You're doing well spreading your elbows wide. Try to keep your shoulders relaxed and avoid pulling forward.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide. Focus on keeping your head upright and maintaining this position.
You held the position well. Remember to keep your elbows wide and head upright during the hold.
Great job reversing the motion. Continue to keep your elbows wide as you return to the starting position.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Keep up the good work of raising your clasped hands and spreading your elbows wide. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
